meanings.definition: Treat or impregnate with borax or a borate.
meanings.sent1: She is borating the laundry to make it cleaner.
meanings.sent2: The scientist is borating the solution to conduct an experiment.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally ended up borating the soup instead of adding salt.
meanings.sent4: The gardener is borating the soil to ensure healthy plant growth.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler is borating the metal to improve its durability.

meanings.definition: To combine or mix with borax or a borate.
meanings.sent1: The artist is borating different colors to create a unique paint shade.
meanings.sent2: The chemist is borating the chemicals to form a new compound.
meanings.sent3: The baker was borating the ingredients for the cake when the phone rang.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic is borating the lubricant for better engine performance.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter is borating the wood to protect it from termites.
